entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
